ygData.subject: RE: Electrum bracers -ooc
ygData.msgSnippet: That is what I have heard that those sweet little bracers do as a bonus effect. Yinin of Mithanial Marr ... From: Nathan Paquette
ygData.messageBody:
That is what I have heard that those sweet little bracers do as a bonus
effect.

Yinin of Mithanial Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Nathan Paquette [mailto:paquette@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 2:58 PM
To: _eq_magic@onelist.com
Subject: [_EQ_Magic] Electrum bracers -ooc


From: Nathan Paquette <paquette@...>

I just picked up a pair of electrum bracers from a talented little gnome
jeweler and have a question....The stats on this are +10 mana, +10
health,
2 ac per bracer (just incase I mislabeled it)...It seems to me that
since
getting these that my mana has been regenerating much faster than
before.
I used to lag further and further behind the wizard I travel with when
we
were recuperating after a battle but now I can start from less and come
out ahead of him (I am a shaman). Did I conjure some super rations or
has
someone else noticed this when wearing them? I'm about 4 pixels away
from
a new level, so there was no new learning or levels involved and as I
now
have more mana it should seem even slower...

I dunno....just curious if anyone appeared to have noticed the same
thing.


Terrek Clouddancer
Erollisi Marr
